sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEATON, a ſmall fiſhing town on the ſouth coaſt of Devon, between Lyme and Sidmouth. Rildon ſays “our learned antiquarians would have it to be that Maridunum whereof Antonine ſpake, placed between Dunnovaria and Iſca; for Maridunum in Britiſh is the ſame with Seaton in Engliſh, ‘a town upon a-hill by the ſea-ſide.” This place is memorable for the Daniſh princes landing there in the year 937.
